content: lincoln - a baby blanket a sweet blanket for a sweet baby page 1 of 7 lincoln baby blanket @2024 jennifer owens for personal use only pattern support- jennits12@gmail com lincoln - a baby blanket this basketweave style baby blanket features fun bobbles a wavy lace pattern and some elongated cable stitches the garter edging is worked along with the blanket and to improve the structure of the blanket some short row were added along the edging sizes s m l approximate measurements s = 26 x 32 / 66 x 70 cm m= 32 x 32 / 81 x 81 cm l = 37 ½ x 40 / 96 5 x 104 cm easily adjustable yarn worsted weight yellow sample shown is size s and was worked in yarn stormers hand dyed 100% superwash merino 220 yds per 100g skein in marigold 3 4 5 skeins multicolored sample is size m and was worked in cascade nifty cotton splash 100% cotton 185 yds per 100g skein in 218 sulphur lake 4 4 5 skeins approximate yardage 600 700 900 yds gauge 18 sts and 24 row=4 in st st 18 sts and 30 sts = 4 in garter st after blocking gauge is not too important but will affect the final size and amount of yarn needed needles main us size 7 4 5mm straights or long circular needle or size needed to obtain gauge edging us size 6 4mm straights or long circular needle or needle one size smaller than main needle skill level intermediate techniques to know making bobbles instructional video provided increases and decreases simple lace sts simple cables german short row or comparable method page 2 of 7 lincoln baby blanket @2024 jennifer owens for personal use only pattern support- jennits12@gmail com lincoln - a baby blanket abbreviation and definitions k knit k4tog knit 4 sts together kwrp2 knit wrapping the yarn around the needle 2 times lh left hand lpcdec sl 3 sts to cable needle and hold to front p2 then sl1 k2tog psso off cable needle 2 sts decrease d p purl rpcdec sl 2 sts to cable needle and hold to back k3tog then p2 off cable needle 2 sts decrease d rs right side ssssk slip 4 sts one at a time from lh needle to rh needle knitwise knit them together through the back loop 3 sts decrease d sl slip st s stitch es ws wrong side yo yarn over make bobble mb 1 k yo k yo k into one stitch creating 5 loops on rh needle 2 yo pass the 5 loops over the yo and off the rh needle one at a time 3 with tip of lh needle pick up loop from st in the row below twist it and place onto rh needle 4 yo and pass the next two sts over the yo and off the rh needle one at at time in this order first the second st and then the
